review: This device beats the Google Chromecast by a nose. The Amazon Fire Stick just feels a little faster. I like how easy it is to play Indie games (some games Amazon Fire Game Controller is needed). The interface is cool, very easy to navigate. Enable the Screen Mirroring on the AFS and on your smartphone to view your Pictures or home videos. On the flip side, when streaming, the content is slightly too bright and video might be a little pixelated at times. Just FYI, you do have to input your name and password for each service you use like Netflix and Pandora, just once. Over all I'm satisfied. Those few extra bucks are worth it if you have Amazon Prime.
